_inspectorSnowReport.Report:
Updated: Feb 13, 2026

Behind every great ski run is a whole lot of overnight work! With 15 renovated trails completed, and our base still sitting around a metre deep, our teams have been busy. Get the full scoop in our Operations Update on the blog.
_inspectorSnowReport.Alert: Please Note: Valley Express Closed at 4:30PM today (Wednesday, February 18) and scheduled to re-open tomorrow at 9AM.
